root.name: Waxworks
root.description: OverviewReleased in 1992 Waxworks is part adventure game and part dungeon crawler. The game is notorious for it's use of gory images every time you encounter death which happens frequently. The player is tasked with entering four historical periods and stopping an evil twin's rampages.

similar_games.game: Déjà Vu: A Nightmare Comes True
